description: Composite numbers n such that phi(n) + 2 | sigma(n).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
mathematica: Select[Range[1000], Divisible[DivisorSigma[1, #], EulerPhi[#] + 2] && ! PrimeQ[#] &] (* David Nacin, Mar 01 2012 *)
prog: (PARI) is(n)=!isprime(n) && sigma(n)%(eulerphi(n)+2)==0 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 25 2012
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
